Question: Later given the honour of naming the newly discovered species, he named it this person's turtle (Elseya irwini) after his family.
Hints: This person was as enthusiastic about his family as he was about his work.
In the film this person (who portrayed himself and performed numerous stunts) mistakes some CIA agents for poachers.
Terri **** said their child was in no more danger than one being taught to swim.
